  1. io.netty.channel.socket.oio
  2. OioServerSocketChannelConfig

Uses of Interface
io.netty.channel.socket.oio.OioServerSocketChannelConfig

Packages that use OioServerSocketChannelConfig
Package
Description
io.netty.channel.socket.oio
Old blocking I/O based socket channel API implementation - recommended for a small number of connections (< 1000).

  • Uses of OioServerSocketChannelConfig in io.netty.channel.socket.oio
